arts.ttl: The cost of Derby County appointing John Eustace has been revealed
arts.sum: Leading bookmakers have closed the odds on Derby County appointing John Eustace as their new manager - but it could come at a costly price to the Rams. SkyBet have withdrawn their runners and riders for the job with Blackburn Rovers boss Eustace a clear favourite to take over at Pride Park.

arts.ttl: Paul Warne message to Derby County squad revealed as Matt Hamshaw responds to exit
arts.sum: Asked if he had spoken to Warne after he departed the club on Friday, Hamshaw said: "I spoke to him six or seven times, and it's tough to take. Interim boss Matt Hamshaw has revealed how Paul Warne sent a message to the Derby County squad prior to their 1-1 draw at Norwich City and said the players were devastated by his departure.

arts.ttl: Derby County player ratings v Norwich City as Jerry Yates late drama halts dreadful run - Leigh Curtis
arts.sum: Derby had some encouraging moments when Nathaniel Mendez-Laing got in behind the Norwich defence, but chose the wrong option. In fact, Derby had the ball in the back of the net which was the result of an excellent move which ended with Ben Osborn crossing for Lars-Jorgen Salvesen smashing into the roof of the net.

arts.ttl: Derby strike late penalty to hold Norwich
arts.sum: Substitute Jerry Yates converted a stoppage-time penalty to earn Derby a dramatic 1-1 draw at Norwich and end a run of seven successive Championship defeats in the process.

arts.ttl: Jerry Yates rescues precious point for Derby as Norwich pay the penalty
arts.sum: Josh Sargent had given the Canaries the lead.

arts.ttl: Paul Merson wades in on John Eustace to Derby County and says 'I wouldn’t mind being manager'
arts.sum: Sky Sports pundits were left bewildered over the prospect of John Eustace possibly becoming the new manager of Derby County - but Paul Merson hit back at his colleagues stating that the job is a great one he 'wouldn't mind' having himself. But as the discussion made its way onto Sky Sports Soccer Saturday, former Tottenham and Aston Villa boss Tim Sherwood plus former Nottingham Forest defender Michael Dawson could not see why the 45-year-old would return to the club he played for in two separate spells when he has a job with a club 16 places higher in the table.

arts.ttl: Derby County make changes as new boy makes debut at Norwich City after Paul Warne exit
arts.sum: With first-team coach Matt Hamshaw placed in charge after Warne's exit yesterday, new signing Sondre Langas started following his £4m switch from Viking FK last weekend. Liam Thompson is also given a place in the Derby team while Callum Elder and Ryan Nyambe are fit enough to take their place on the bench after groin and hip problems respectively.

arts.ttl: MATCHDAY LIVE: Norwich City v Derby County
arts.sum: Follow live updates and join the debate at Carrow Road as Norwich City face managerless Derby County in the Championship.

arts.ttl: Boss hoping Harrison Armstrong can follow in footsteps of Everton 'great' honed at Derby County
arts.sum: Yet before he could don his boots for the struggling Championship side, who sit third bottom and two points shy of safety, Derby announced they'd dismissed Paul Warne just one day before their game against Norwich City. In his pre-match press conference ahead of Everton's FA Cup fourth-round clash with Bournemouth, Toffees' boss Moyes reflected on the loan system and its benefits, citing Leon Osman as a prime example.

arts.ttl: The eight transfer deals Derby County completed in the January window
arts.sum: Derby added four signings to the squad after the January window opened while there were departures too with Eiran Cashin being the headline exit after he moved to Brighton for a fee of £9m. Derby County completed the January transfer window with four signings as they wrapped up their business for the final time this season.
